TopicTitle: Using Mechjeb to lauch into a clockwise orbit

Articles.Content:
Is this possible? regardless of what I put into inclination I always launch counterclockwise.

Thanks

Ehm.. What is a clockwise and counterclockwise orbit?? You mean retrograde orbit? retrograde orbit is more than 90 and less than -90 inclination. Type in 180 for a total retrograde.

I think that also mechjeb sometimes doesn't update correctly, type in the inclination then try changing the altitude (just write the same one), altitude change should update the whole ascent autopilot. I'd prefer there is a separate update button so you are sure it works, and also this would prevent changing altitude while typing in.
I assume you mean retrograde, so that would be a 180 degree inclination.
